013package org.apache.juneau.assertions;
014
015import java.io.*;
016import java.util.function.*;
017
018import org.apache.juneau.common.internal.*;
019import org.apache.juneau.cp.*;
020import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
021import org.apache.juneau.serializer.*;
022
023/**
024 * Used for fluent assertion calls against comparable objects.
025 *
026 * <h5 class='section'>Test Methods:</h5>
027 * <p>
028 * <ul class='javatree'>
029 *    <li class='jc'>{@link FluentComparableAssertion}
030 *    <ul class='javatreec'>
031 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentComparableAssertion#isGt(Comparable) isGt(Comparable)}
032 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentComparableAssertion#isGte(Comparable) isGte(Comparable)}
033 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentComparableAssertion#isLt(Comparable) isLt(Comparable)}
034 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentComparableAssertion#isLte(Comparable) isLte(Comparable)}
035 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentComparableAssertion#isBetween(Comparable,Comparable) isBetween(Comparable,Comparable)}
036 *    </ul>
037 *    <li class='jc'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion}
038 *    <ul class='javatreec'>
039 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isExists() isExists()}
040 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#is(Object) is(Object)}
041 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#is(Predicate) is(Predicate)}
042 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isNot(Object) isNot(Object)}
043 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isAny(Object...) isAny(Object...)}
044 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isNotAny(Object...) isNotAny(Object...)}
045 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isNull() isNull()}
046 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isNotNull() isNotNull()}
047 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isString(String) isString(String)}
048 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isJson(String) isJson(String)}
049 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isSame(Object) isSame(Object)}
050 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isSameJsonAs(Object) isSameJsonAs(Object)}
051 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isSameSortedJsonAs(Object) isSameSortedJsonAs(Object)}
052 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isSameSerializedAs(Object, WriterSerializer) isSameSerializedAs(Object, WriterSerializer)}
053 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isType(Class) isType(Class)}
054 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#isExactType(Class) isExactType(Class)}
055 *    </ul>
056 * </ul>
057 *
058 * <h5 class='section'>Transform Methods:</h5>
059 * <p>
060 * <ul class='javatree'>
061 *    <li class='jc'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion}
062 *    <ul class='javatreec'>
063 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#asString() asString()}
064 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#asString(WriterSerializer) asString(WriterSerializer)}
065 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#asString(Function) asString(Function)}
066 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#asJson() asJson()}
067 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#asJsonSorted() asJsonSorted()}
068 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#asTransformed(Function) asApplied(Function)}
069 *       <li class='jm'>{@link FluentObjectAssertion#asAny() asAny()}
070 * </ul>
071 * </ul>
072 *
073 * <h5 class='section'>Configuration Methods:</h5>
074 * <p>
075 * <ul class='javatree'>
076 *    <li class='jc'>{@link Assertion}
077 *    <ul class='javatreec'>
078 *       <li class='jm'>{@link Assertion#setMsg(String, Object...) setMsg(String, Object...)}
079 *       <li class='jm'>{@link Assertion#setOut(PrintStream) setOut(PrintStream)}
080 *       <li class='jm'>{@link Assertion#setSilent() setSilent()}
081 *       <li class='jm'>{@link Assertion#setStdOut() setStdOut()}
082 *       <li class='jm'>{@link Assertion#setThrowable(Class) setThrowable(Class)}
083 *    </ul>
084 * </ul>
085 *
086 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
087 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="../../../../index.html#ja.Overview">Overview &gt; juneau-assertions &gt; Overview</a>
088 * </ul>
089 *
090 * @param <T> The value type
091 * @param <R> The return type.
092 */
093@FluentSetters(returns="FluentComparableAssertion<T,R>")
094@SuppressWarnings("rawtypes")
095public class FluentComparableAssertion<T extends Comparable,R> extends FluentObjectAssertion<T,R> {
096
097   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
098   // Static
099   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
100
101   private static final Messages MESSAGES = Messages.of(FluentComparableAssertion.class, "Messages");
102   private static final String
103      MSG_valueWasNotGreaterThanExpected = MESSAGES.getString("valueWasNotGreaterThanExpected"),
104      MSG_valueWasNotGreaterOrEqualsToExpected = MESSAGES.getString("valueWasNotGreaterOrEqualsToExpected"),
105      MSG_valueWasNotLessThanExpected = MESSAGES.getString("valueWasNotLessThanExpected"),
106      MSG_valueWasNotLessOrEqualsToExpected = MESSAGES.getString("valueWasNotLessOrEqualsToExpected");
107
108   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
109   // Instance
110   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
111
112   /**
113    * Constructor.
114    *
115    * @param value
116    *    The object being tested.
117    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk>.
118    * @param returns
119    *    The object to return after a test method is called.
120    *    <br>If <jk>null</jk>, the test method returns this object allowing multiple test method calls to be
121    * used on the same assertion.
122    */
123   public FluentComparableAssertion(T value, R returns) {
124      this(null, value, returns);
125   }
126
127   /**
128    * Chained constructor.
129    *
130    * <p>
131    * Used when transforming one assertion into another so that the assertion config can be used by the new assertion.
132    *
133    * @param creator
134    *    The assertion that created this assertion.
135    *    <br>Should be <jk>null</jk> if this is the top-level assertion.
136    * @param value
137    *    The object being tested.
138    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk>.
139    * @param returns
140    *    The object to return after a test method is called.
141    *    <br>If <jk>null</jk>, the test method returns this object allowing multiple test method calls to be
142    * used on the same assertion.
143    */
144   public FluentComparableAssertion(Assertion creator, T value, R returns) {
145      super(creator, value, returns);
146   }
147
148   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
149   // Transform methods
150   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
151
152   @Override /* FluentObjectAssertion */
153   public FluentComparableAssertion<T,R> asTransformed(Function<T,T> function) {  // NOSONAR - Intentional.
154      return new FluentComparableAssertion<>(this, function.apply(orElse(null)), returns());
155   }
156
157   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
158   // Test methods
159   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
160
161   /**
162    * Asserts that the value is greater than the specified value.
163    *
164    * @param value The values to check against.
165    * @return The fluent return object.
166    * @throws AssertionError If assertion failed.
167    */
168   public R isGt(Comparable value) throws AssertionError {
169      Utils.assertArgNotNull("value", value);
170      if (value().compareTo(value) <= 0)
171         throw error(MSG_valueWasNotGreaterThanExpected, value, value());
172      return returns();
173   }
174
175   /**
176    * Asserts that the value is greater than or equal to the specified value.
177    *
178    * @param value The values to check against.
179    * @return The fluent return object.
180    * @throws AssertionError If assertion failed.
181    */
182   public R isGte(Comparable value) throws AssertionError {
183      Utils.assertArgNotNull("value", value);
184      if (value().compareTo(value) < 0)
185            throw error(MSG_valueWasNotGreaterOrEqualsToExpected, value, value());
186      return returns();
187   }
188
189   /**
190    * Asserts that the value is less than the specified value.
191    *
192    * @param value The values to check against.
193    * @return The fluent return object.
194    * @throws AssertionError If assertion failed.
195    */
196   public R isLt(Comparable value) throws AssertionError {
197      Utils.assertArgNotNull("value", value);
198      if (value().compareTo(value) >= 0)
199            throw error(MSG_valueWasNotLessThanExpected, value, value());
200      return returns();
201   }
202
203   /**
204    * Asserts that the value is less than or equals to the specified value.
205    *
206    * @param value The values to check against.
207    * @return The fluent return object.
208    * @throws AssertionError If assertion failed.
209    */
210   public R isLte(Comparable value) throws AssertionError {
211      Utils.assertArgNotNull("value", value);
212      if (value().compareTo(value) > 0)
213            throw error(MSG_valueWasNotLessOrEqualsToExpected, value, value());
214      return returns();
215   }
216
217   /**
218    * Asserts that the value is between (inclusive) the specified upper and lower values.
219    *
220    * @param lower The lower value to check against.
221    * @param upper The upper value to check against.
222    * @return The fluent return object.
223    * @throws AssertionError If assertion failed.
224    */
225   public R isBetween(Comparable lower, Comparable upper) throws AssertionError {
226      isExists();
227      Utils.assertArgNotNull("lower", lower);
228      Utils.assertArgNotNull("upper", upper);
229      isLte(upper);
230      isGte(lower);
231      return returns();
232   }
233
234   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
235   // Fluent setters
236   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
237
238   // <FluentSetters>
239
240   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.assertions.Assertion */
241   public FluentComparableAssertion<T,R> setMsg(String msg, Object...args) {
242      super.setMsg(msg, args);
243      return this;
244   }
245
246   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.assertions.Assertion */
247   public FluentComparableAssertion<T,R> setOut(PrintStream value) {
248      super.setOut(value);
249      return this;
250   }
251
252   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.assertions.Assertion */
253   public FluentComparableAssertion<T,R> setSilent() {
254      super.setSilent();
255      return this;
256   }
257
258   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.assertions.Assertion */
259   public FluentComparableAssertion<T,R> setStdOut() {
260      super.setStdOut();
261      return this;
262   }
263
264   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.assertions.Assertion */
265   public FluentComparableAssertion<T,R> setThrowable(Class<? extends java.lang.RuntimeException> value) {
266      super.setThrowable(value);
267      return this;
268   }
269
270   // </FluentSetters>
271}
